required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Cysteine-lowering Treatment With Mesna Against Obesity: Phase I Dose-finding Study

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to determine the efficacy of the drug Mesna® (Uromitexan) in healthy participants with overweight or obesity with respect to change in plasma concentrations of total cysteine, following single ascending doses of oral Mesna.

detailed_description.textblock:
In both animal experiments and human studies, cysteine in the blood is strongly associated with obesity. In rodents, changes in cysteine induced by dietary means are accompanied by changes in fat mass.
In this phase I, single ascending dose study the investigators will determine the effects of Mesna in healthy volunteers with overweight and obesity with focus on its effects on plasma total cysteine concentrations. The aim of this dose-finding clinical trial is to determine the lowest single oral Mesna dose that will lower plasma total cysteine concentrations by 30% using pharmacokinetic (PK)/ pharmacodynamic (PD) modelling. The investigators will further evaluate the effect of Mesna on plasma cysteine fractions and related metabolites, urinary cysteine excretion, safety and adverse drug reactions, and plasma biomarkers.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma total cysteine concentrations following single ascending doses of oral Mesna.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Several intervals during the first 12 hours after Mensa administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Several intervals during the first 12 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum plasma Mesna concentration (Cmax) after a single oral Mesna dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameter - time to maximum plasma concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Several intervals during the first 12 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3
secondary_outcome.description: Time to maximum plasma Mesna concentration (Tmax) after a single oral Mesna dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameter - area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Several intervals during the first 12 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma Mesna concentration-time curve (AUC)0-inf after a single oral Mesna dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Several intervals during the first 12 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3
secondary_outcome.description: Elimination rate constant (Kel) for Mesna after a single oral Mesna dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Several intervals during the first 12 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3
secondary_outcome.description: Dose linearity of Mesna after a single oral Mesna dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in plasma cystine, free reduced cysteine, and protein bound cysteine
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Several intervals during the first 12 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3
During the first 24 hours after Mesna administration
secondary_outcome.description: Cumulative and fractional excretion of total cysteine and Mesna

secondary_outcome.time_frame: During the first 5 days after Mesna administration
secondary_outcome.description: Occurrence/prevalence of side effects, adverse events, and serious adverse events

other_outcome.measure: Changes in plasma and urine sulfur amino acids and related metabolites
other_outcome.time_frame: Several intervals during the first 12 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3

other_outcome.measure: Changes in plasma biomarker concentration - glucose
other_outcome.time_frame: During the first 24 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3

other_outcome.measure: Changes in plasma biomarker concentration - insulin
other_outcome.time_frame: During the first 24 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3

other_outcome.measure: Changes in plasma biomarker concentration - lipids
other_outcome.time_frame: During the first 24 hours after Mesna administration, and a fasting sample on days 2 and 3

arm_group.description: Administration of a single oral dose of 400 mg, 800 mg, 1200 mg or 1600 mg

intervention.description: Administration of a single oral dose, using film-coated tablets of either 400 mg or 600 mg or a combination of maximum 3 tablets up to a maximum of 1600 mg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- BMI between BMI 27-40 kg/m2
- Age between 18-55 years
- Male
- Healthy as determined by medical evaluation, medical history, physical examination, 12-lead ECG, and laboratory tests
Exclusion Criteria:
- Presence of chronic disease
- Chronic drug use
- Past or intended use of over-the-counter or prescription medication including herbal medications within 14 days prior to dosing
- Veganism
- Strenuous physical activity ≥3 times every week
- Smoking

patient_data.ipd_description: Data that support the findings of this study may be available upon reasonable request from qualified users.
